markdownRemark.html:
So I'm a week into this Capstone project. My group's project used no technology taught at Grace Hopper. It's a combination of Vuphoria, Unity, C#, MySQL, and PHP (please refrain your laughter at the last language). At the very beginning, our instructor pulled up at chart for our cohort to see comparing risk and ambition.

"You really want to avoid this area," he said, pointing to high risk, high ambition.

"This includes using a tech stack that is completely different than anything you know."

I am so very

"Were we attending the same bootcamp?"

This question was posed upon me by a fellow student in my cohort. I looked down at the floor, feeling the smile on my face.

We were demoing our half finished projects
